title: Ekko Hype! :D
body:
For starters, I absolutely LOVE the new champ Ekko, thanks Riot for making another coloured champ! I am more hyped as he's a Zaunite and he also reminds me of the Supreme Kai and Uub from DBZ if they used the fusion earings! (Don't know who they are? There's pictures below! :D) 
I'm just really hoping they actually give him a decent lore unlike the last couple that have been given like 3 - 4 lines that doesn't really explain anything new. He may possibly have a connection to Jinx as well! There was a picture of her to the left of the wall that had the candles lit up, looked kinda like a memorial. So many questions already! I also wanna know who the kid was in the middle of the other pictures, he's most likely a friend of Ekko as he looked so heart broken at the end when the wall was shattered, so maybe his friend died or disappeared?
Gonna guess that he's a top laner, assuming on his fighting style. I'm not much of a top laner, but I will deffs try for him. I'm also interested who Ekko was fighting, looked like Urgot with legs xD But it was confirmed it wasn't the Urgot rework, so who exactly was he? Maybe a troop sent to steal Ekkos time weapon? Who knows! Either way, I just can't wait! What's everyone's thoughts and ideas? :3
EKKO HYPE!~
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/05/ekko-preview.html#more - In case you don't follow Surrender at 20 like a mad man, here's a link to the Ekko preview video!

replies.body:
I also believed the person he was fighting was a hinted Urgot rework or something, but from what i have read it's Augmented Singed :s which makes a lot more sense.

I cant wait for this champion, definitely seems like a cool champion many people will main like a Yasuo, Zed or Riven sorta type.

crossover between DBZ, LoL, and DC comics confirmed.

Aha yeah I was thinking Bane too in the end when it was confirmed not to be Urgot xD I think Riot have really won me over with this DBZ cross over (Or so I will believe it is from DBZ!) And then fighting a Bane look like? O: Too good.

Oh yeah, Augmented Singed o: This is very interesting xD He and Urgot are both from Zaun but I guess Urgot would still be Urgot chopped in half, cause that'd mess up some lore then I suppose if it was Urgot, even in his remake.

He looks awesome, all my friend don't like him so far xD I'm kinda hoping not that many people will main him cause i love playing champs barely anyone else does. (Like Draven, I barely find anyone who plays him).
